Sentencas: Solid electrolytes are mostly used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)

Sentencas: In the present study, gallium-substituted compounds (Bi4V2-xMexO11-delta; Me=Ga3+; 0 <= x <= 0.4) were prepared by solid-state reaction technique for its use as an electrolyte in SOFC.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)

Sentencas: Structural and conductivity behavior was studied as a function of the Ga3+ substitution on vanadium site.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)

Sentencas: The compounds remain in the orthorhombic a-phase for x=0 and 0.1 whereas higher concentration of dopant leads to beta-phase stabilization.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)

Sentencas: The highest and lowest ionic conductivity were observed in x=0.2 and x=0.4 samples, respectively.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)

Sentencas: The prepared samples were studied by using alternating current conductivity, differential thermal analysis and X-ray diffraction techniques.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)

Sentencas: The results are discussed on the basis of formation of oxygen vacancy and its ordering.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and transport properties of Bi4V2-xGaxO11-δ (0≤x≤0.4)
